About Project

This project will allow you to quickly create a mobile application in the field of meditation, sound and sleep. The package contains a ready-made and well-thought-out design of the entire application, as well as all the unique content (Sounds, Music, Covers).


Also, you will not need to create graphics for the stores, everything is already ready. The uniqueness of the project design in Figma will allow you to easily change the application palette and graphics.


Do you need to relax after a hard day or just improve your sleep to feel focused and healthy? Our app will help you. You can relax and sleep with sleeping sounds, nature sounds, rain sounds, fairy tales and meditation music and much more. Enjoy the high quality sleep sounds, HQ Music and wake up refreshed.


You'll Get

  • Android app Design: 20 Screens;
  • Native Libraries: iOS - Android;
  • Store resources: 5 Screens;
  • App Icons: iOS - Android;
  • Graphic content: All Music Covers;
